content:
:one: **Be respectful** Be respectful and mindful of all users, do NOT start unnecessary drama and arguments and treat others the way you want to be treated. This includes respecting when a user doesn't want to discuss a particular topic or disrupting conversations.
:two: **No inflammatory Language** Any derogatory language, Racial slurs, sexual harassment or otherwise is prohibited... Be nice. 
:three: **No spamming** Don't send a lot of small messages right after each other. Do not disrupt chat with excessive messages ( including but not limited to emotes, text, images, gifs).
:four: **No pornographic/adult/other NSFW material** This is a community server and not the place to share this kind of material.
:five: **No advertisements** No advertisements or sales whether it be for other communities or streams. Do not attempt to buy or sell (including but not limited to merch, tickets, etc).
:six: **No Raiding** Raiding or mentions of raiding are not allowed.
:seven: **No direct & Indirect Threats** Threats to other users (including but not limited to DDoS, Death, DoX, abuse, and other malicious threats) are absolutely prohibited and disallowed. 

Follow the Discord Community Guidelines at **all times**, you can view the guidelines [here](https://discordapp.com/guidelines)

The Admins and Mods will Mute/Kick/Ban per discretion. If you feel mistreated dm an **Admin** and they will resolve the issue.

Your presence in this server implies accepting these rules, including all further changes. These changes might be done at any time without notice, it is your responsibility to stay up to date with them.
